statements.select: SELECT DISTINCT T1.APA_UOM FROM BS_AutoPartsArchive T1 WHERE T1.APA_IsValid = 1 AND T1.APA_UOM IS NOT NULL AND T1.APA_UOM != ''

DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.APA_ID) FROM BS_AutoPartsArchive T1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.APA_SUPP_ID LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T3 ON T3.WH_ID = T1.APA_WH_ID LEFT JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T4 ON T4.WHB_ID = T1.APA_WHB_ID WHERE T1.APA_IsValid = 1
T1.APA_Barcode LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Barcode#+'%'
(T1.APA_OEMNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoPartsCode#+'%' OR T1.APA_ThirdNo LIKE '%' + #WHERE_AutoPartsCode# + '%' )
T1.APA_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Name#+'%'
T1.APA_Brand LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Brand#+'%'
T1.APA_Specification LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Specification#+'%'
T1.APA_Level LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Level#+'%'
T1.APA_VehicleModelCode LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_VehicleModelCode#+'%'
T1.APA_ExchangeCode LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_ExchangeCode#+'%'
T2.SUPP_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Name#+'%'
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount', T1.APA_ID , T1.APA_Org_ID , T1.APA_Barcode , T1.APA_OEMNo , T1.APA_ThirdNo , T1.APA_Name , T1.APA_Brand , T1.APA_Specification , T1.APA_UOM , T1.APA_Level , T1.APA_VehicleBrand , T1.APA_VehicleInspire , T1.APA_VehicleCapacity , T1.APA_VehicleYearModel , T1.APA_VehicleGearboxTypeCode , T1.APA_VehicleGearboxTypeName , T1.APA_SUPP_ID , T2.SUPP_Name , T1.APA_WH_ID , T3.WH_Name , T1.APA_WHB_ID , T4.WHB_Name , T1.APA_IsWarningSafeStock , T1.APA_SafeStockNum , T1.APA_IsWarningDeadStock , T1.APA_SlackDays , T1.APA_SalePriceRate , T1.APA_SalePrice , T1.APA_VehicleModelCode , T1.APA_ExchangeCode , T1.APA_IsValid , T1.APA_CreatedBy , T1.APA_CreatedTime , T1.APA_UpdatedBy , T1.APA_UpdatedTime , T1.APA_VersionNo , T1.APA_TransID FROM BS_AutoPartsArchive T1 LEFT JOIN PIS_Supplier T2 ON T2.SUPP_ID = T1.APA_SUPP_ID LEFT JOIN PIS_Warehouse T3 ON T3.WH_ID = T1.APA_WH_ID LEFT JOIN PIS_WarehouseBin T4 ON T4.WHB_ID = T1.APA_WHB_ID WHERE T1.APA_IsValid = 1
T1.APA_Barcode LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Barcode#+'%'
(T1.APA_OEMNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoPartsCode#+'%' OR T1.APA_ThirdNo LIKE '%' + #WHERE_AutoPartsCode# + '%' )
T1.APA_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Name#+'%'
T1.APA_Brand LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Brand#+'%'
T1.APA_Specification LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Specification#+'%'
T1.APA_Level LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_Level#+'%'
T1.APA_VehicleModelCode LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_VehicleModelCode#+'%'
T1.APA_ExchangeCode LIKE '%'+#WHERE_APA_ExchangeCode#+'%'
T2.SUPP_Name LIKE '%'+#WHERE_SUPP_Name#+'%'
ORDER BY T1.APA_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(T1.TempID) FROM ( SELECT T11.SID_ID 'TempID' FROM PIS_StockInDetail T11 WHERE T11.SID_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T11.SID_Barcode, '') != '' AND T11.SID_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode# UNION
SELECT T12.SOD_ID 'TempID' FROM SD_SalesOrderDetail T12 WHERE T12.SOD_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T12.SOD_Barcode, '') != '' AND T12.SOD_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode# UNION
SELECT T13.SasTD_ID 'TempID' FROM SD_SalesTemplateDetail T13 WHERE T13.SasTD_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T13.SasTD_Barcode, '') != '' AND T13.SasTD_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode# UNION
SELECT T14.SFOD_ID 'TempID' FROM SD_SalesForecastOrderDetail T14 WHERE T14.SFOD_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T14.SFOD_Barcode, '') != '' AND T14.SFOD_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode# UNION
SELECT T15.INV_ID 'TempID' FROM PIS_Inventory T15 WHERE T15.INV_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T15.INV_Barcode, '') != '' AND T15.INV_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode# UNION
SELECT T16.TBD_ID 'TempID' FROM PIS_TransferBillDetail T16 WHERE T16.TBD_IsValid = 1 AND ISNULL(T16.TBD_Barcode, '') != '' AND T16.TBD_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode# ) T1

SELECT 0 'IsChecked' , LOWER(NEWID()) 'Tmp_ID', T1.APPT_ID , T1.APPT_Org_ID , T1.APPT_Name , T1.APPT_Barcode , T1.APPT_Price , T1.APPT_IsValid , T1.APPT_CreatedBy , T1.APPT_CreatedTime , T1.APPT_UpdatedBy , T1.APPT_UpdatedTime , T1.APPT_VersionNo FROM BS_AutoPartsPriceType T1 WHERE T1.APPT_IsValid = 1 AND T1.APPT_Barcode = #WHERE_APA_Barcode#

SELECT T1.APPT_ID , T1.APPT_Org_ID , T1.APPT_Name , T1.APPT_Barcode , T1.APPT_Price , T1.APPT_IsValid , T1.APPT_CreatedBy , T1.APPT_CreatedTime , T1.APPT_UpdatedBy , T1.APPT_UpdatedTime , T1.APPT_VersionNo FROM BS_AutoPartsPriceType T1 WHERE T1.APPT_IsValid = 1 AND #WHERE_APPT_ID# LIKE '%' + T1.APPT_ID + ';%'
